conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model successfully translates the 2D floor plan into a volumetric isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined wall heights, thickness, and a clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. All rooms, partitions, and openings align perfectly with the source plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement captures almost all details from the plan including kitchen sink and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no UI clutter. Lighting is soft and logical.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window frames compared to the detailed architectural symbols.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric correspondence and interior detailing.
